title: Maokai "Champion is not yet available"
body:
Ever since the maokai update, I have not been able to purchase this champion in order to play him. I can however play him during this free week.

This a bug? My account cursed? Is he locked? pls halp :c

replies.body: Hi! Maokai was disabled due to a bug. The issue has been resolved, and he should be unlocked and available to play! Lemme know if you're still having issues!

hmm so you didn't wanna play him before? 

what got you so interested now ? 

just curious ... 
(seems like a bug  , id submit a support ticket and tell them you would like to buy maokai and see if they can add it to your account and take whatever RP/IP is needed)

> hmm so you didn't wanna play him before? 

correct xD

ok I'll do that - Danke Amigo
